<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Known Weaknesses](/Feats.aspx?ID=1447) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 60 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Whenever you [Devise a Stratagem](/Actions.aspx?ID=546), you can also attempt a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) as part of that action. If you critically succeed at the Recall Knowledge check, you notice a weakness and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll from Devise a Stratagem. If you immediately convey this information to your allies as part of the check, each ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.
name: Known Weaknesses
